website_summaries.verdict: Quiet, efficient radiant heater that’s safe for use around children and pets.
pros: Offers three heat settings that can reach up to 1500 watts, as well as an adjustable thermostat to customize the temperature to suit your needs
Features tip-over and overheating protection for safe operation
Sturdy wheels make it easy to roll from room to room
Power cord wraps around the heater for easy storage
cons: Some owners find the high setting doesn’t get as hot as they’d like

customer_reviews.title: Good Mobile Heater
customer_reviews.text: Came on time in excellent condition. Good heater and this is my second one. I use them in the barn and green house.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It gets cool downstairs, but the heater makes it warm
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace a much older heater that had a meltdown. It was 20 years old. The new Tangkula heater is half the size and actually puts out as much heat. The red light stays on as long as it's plugged in, but no other light shows that the unit is on. We own a bi-level home and it's halfway in the ground. It gets cool downstairs, but the heater makes it warm, and does not cost much to run.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Vagnoni

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: I needed to heat a back room occasionally and this machine works just fine for that. You can set it to a temperature and it will keep the room at that temperature. No running back to adjust it. Easy assembly for the rolling fee.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Wian

customer_reviews.title: works great. wanted something to heat only one room at ...
customer_reviews.text: works great. wanted something to heat only one room at night. like the way it's so quiet. heats up the room quick enough on high, keeps it at the right temp all night on low, with the thermostat. one odd thing the light stays on whenever it's plugged in, would rather have the light on only when the heater is turned on
customer_reviews.author: Barney

customer_reviews.title: Quiet heat and great functionality
customer_reviews.text: I use this to heat a 12’ x 24’ basement room. It pumps out more than enough heat which means I can switch to the lowest setting to maintain the warmth throughout the day. Great functionality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Horacemann

customer_reviews.title: it's great!
customer_reviews.text: This is hot enough to burn a child or an animal or an elderly or disabled person. I don't think it's appropriate for all households. I will say, if you are careful, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Living Simply

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Heater
customer_reviews.text: This heater really works well. It keeps my apartment toasty warm. If you have a bigger place, you may need to buy two of these, but they are neat and clean and do what Tangkula says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: keeping my storage area and bathroom where is not any other heating nice and toasty
customer_reviews.text: Works well, keeping my storage area and bathroom where is not any other heating nice and toasty. Thermostat works well too, It was good buy.
customer_reviews.author: M. E.

customer_reviews.title: If you want a good oil filled heater, this is the one.
customer_reviews.text: It has worked just as I hoped it would. No problems in this cold winter season we are having in Georgia. It keeps the den area nice which is the farthest room from the heat pump.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbal Garner

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Everything they said it would be. We used 3 of them to assist heading a non insulated cabin in sub 0* temps. We are very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pfair

customer_reviews.title: This Space Hester is Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We were so cold at work we had to buy a couple of heaters and they were everything we needed! We love having these at work to keep up warm! Our waitresses even love having them here so they can hang out by them when they aren’t waiting tables.
customer_reviews.author: Hellen

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: A very good product, the whole room is hot for a few minutes. After closing, the room can also maintain a few hours of temperature, and the entire room is warm. It is also very safe, with pulleys on the bottom to safely isolate the ground and prevent the ground from overheating. Can also adjust different temperatures, currently used very well, I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: fancy song

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This was for my dad and he really liked it. It was really durrable and it works very nice. Thought it’s very warm but it’s not dry.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: So happy I purchase Tangkula Electric Oil Filled Radiator Heater Portable
customer_reviews.text: So happy I purchase Tangkula Electric Oil Filled Radiator Heater Portable Home Room Radiant Heat 5.7 Fin Thermostat I bought 2 of them if you’re going to warm a 120- square foot room its perfect otherwise look for a bigger model with more heat output.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Novick

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome for my green house
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome for my green house. Im sure it would work great in the house too, it just isnt very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low Heat Maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Based on write-ups, I expected an Oil Space Heater to efficiently maintain temperature in our 10' x 12' bathroom. In order for the room to be warm enough when taking a shower, an additional heat source is needed. I don't know about the cost to operate, but the heat output is somewhat disappointing. If it was used in a wellhouse or similar use, it would probably be adequate to prevent pipes from freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Estes

customer_reviews.title: Great heater!
customer_reviews.text: Great heater with no problems to date. Nothing bad about it!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Lane

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm, if it ever arrives
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient. Love the thermostat. It was so very good that I ordered a second unit for another room. None of us can believe that it has taken 8 days for the second heater to arrive, but so far it is true and we desperately need another heater for a different room. The supplier has offered us a small rebate of $8 as compensation for the tardiness in delivery. This is very kind but the $8 does not prevent us from freezing while awaiting the tardy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Bud Mckechnie

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This little heater is used in our unheated sunroom, 33'x15'. In winter, the wood stove keeps the rest of the house warm, and this heater does a fine job keeping our drafty sunroom comfortable. Some days we need to turn it down, as it can be too efficient. Cons: Don't expect instant heat. Because it is oil filled, if it's been off, it does take a bit for it to warm up. On days there is no draft, we do place a very small fan nearby to help facilitate air movement to spread the heat throughout the room.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: My dad like it, it can warm up his small bedroom ...
customer_reviews.text: My dad likes it. It can warm up his small bedroom that has a big sliding door to outside where more cool air can get inside. He only have it on the low setting and its warm enough for him to not have a blanket at bedtime.**it is not noisy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Beautiqueen

customer_reviews.title: didn't heat my one car garage very well
customer_reviews.text: I was not really happy to walk out to my one car garage and find the temp not changed at all. Ran this for a week, and didn't change temp at all...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First it arrived much later than promised and after I had already cancelled the order. Does not put out a lot of heat and it arrived in a box for another product. Still waiting for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Reader

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago and it's been on 24/7 ever since. It works great, heats up the room fairly fast, the thermostat works fine, and we've had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: MSN

customer_reviews.title: Make even a large space warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: It works the same as old ones that we have from few years ago
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Seems safe, good quality, works for large bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a large bedroom and it works great. Adjustable warmth, very effective, no noticeable increase to our PG&E bill. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: G. R.

customer_reviews.title: A piece of JUNK!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It takes a long time to warm up. even then I still able to touch it. A piece of JUNK!!!!! DONT BUY .... NOT RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good heater. Including warning label pics.
customer_reviews.text: Works good for me, I wanted a heater to keep one room comfortable and lower the thermostat for the rest of the apartment. One of the questions wanted to see the warning labels on the heater so I am posting them here. (Also has a Do Not Cover by vents on the top and a This Way Up on the front above the vents)
customer_reviews.author: chase

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Worked a few months last winter and one time this year and then it broke. Won't turn on at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy from company
customer_reviews.text: Everything it doesn’t get hot been contacting seller for months no response product doesn’t deserve a star I only put one because I was forced seller said it only gets warm sorry for misunderstanding it’s not meant for heating and won’t get a whole room warm, you would have stand in front of it literally to feel anything
customer_reviews.author: Loquetta Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Good, quiet heater
customer_reviews.text: It has very faint 'click' when the thermostat engages, but is otherwise silent.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S. in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: loved this heater so much, its compact as well as a good source of heat in the winter
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and looks
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and looks, but I’m surprised it doesn’t put out more heat when set on high. I can physically touch it with my hand without getting burnt on the highest setting
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The enclosed oil heaters function much better than the ones with a fan or the flat panels. Even though this unit is big it fits under my desk. I put it on a timer and set it on low so it heats my feet without changing the room temp. This is exactly what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: 2 of them have done a great job 1 of them didn't eve make it all ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 last November to keep a slow constant heat in our home, 2 of them have done a great job 1 of them didn't eve make it all the way through 1 winter. The high setting is only putting out low heat now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power light is always on even when it's off
customer_reviews.text: The power light is always on even when I turn it off right out of the box. It was a pain to return so my solution is just leave it on all the time or unplug it. So dumb, don't you want the power light to turn off when knob is switched to off like my other space heater?
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Small room heater
customer_reviews.text: Only two of three temperature settings work. Seller compensated me for this defect. Otherwise works as expect for SMALL rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Elmo

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Neat clean appearance, functions well. Use it to keep the living rm at a more even temp. (16 x 16 rm)
customer_reviews.author: Naildriver

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as gift for my nice who moved from Cal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as gift for my nice who moved from Cal. to N.Y.C. She was always cold in her apartment. She loves t h e heater and finally warm.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Mintz

customer_reviews.title: It gets too hot to touch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this under the impression it didn't get too hot too touch...I have a small child & cant risk him touching this because it gets extremely hot & will burn your skin!!! So I cant run it during the day when he is awake.
customer_reviews.author: Mommabear

customer_reviews.title: Good Heater
customer_reviews.text: Heater works well in a decent size room and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using heaters like this to keep our electric bill down in the winter. Our local Walmart quit carrying them. This heater has been the best one we’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It still works when it tilts over
customer_reviews.text: Heating my over sized bedroom it does not keep my room warm when it is 20 degrees outside my room stays cold it only get to 50 degrees in my room when its 20 degrees outside. Oh it is a good heater.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Henry

customer_reviews.title: Never Again
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t put out heat at all. Wish I had gotten two electric heaters that blow out air.
customer_reviews.author: Markeiel McMurray

customer_reviews.title: This is the fourth room heater I've tried and this ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth room heater I've tried and this one works for me! It's silent and effective, though it takes a bit more patience to warm a room; this just takes getting accustomed to. The radiant, gentle heat is much more pleasant than having warm air blown on me.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Takes a long time to heat up
customer_reviews.text: Takes a long time to heat up so when on high you can find yourself sweltering in the night. Only good for small spaces. No auto turnoff. Would go with one with better temperature control gauges next time.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: It fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as I had expected when I ordered it. No surprises
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: does a good job heating a big bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Works well, does a good job heating a big bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON

customer_reviews.title: Toasty and warm
customer_reviews.text: Does the job of keeping my office warm. Exactly what I was looking for. Bought 2 of the for office and home.
customer_reviews.author: Cwboyz235

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decided to return it, as it was too slow to warm up, for how I wanted to use it
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, fast heat up, warm room quick. One small thing bugs me a lot is that Loud click sound often wake me up at night..
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Shore

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like is that I have to unplug it so I ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it that long yet. It appears to work well. The only thing I don't like is that I have to unplug it so I won't use any electric at all.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Takes a long time to heat up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bathroom for the cold mornings getting ready for work. But it takes a good half hour to start heating my small bathroom. By the time it's pouring out the heat I'm shutting it off and heading out for the day. I'm guessing that's a drawback in oil heaters in general. I'm sure it works fine if it's on for more than a hour.
customer_reviews.author: D C

customer_reviews.title: For tiny places
customer_reviews.text: Not heating so much, you have to be so close to it to feel the warmth, only for tiny places.
customer_reviews.author: Marwa Elsabawey

customer_reviews.title: Space Heater
customer_reviews.text: I love her! She works just like the old one, but much better.
customer_reviews.author: Kamonte

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Heater
customer_reviews.text: This product was great. saved me from many cold nights. has different settings which work great and very safe
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this heater because oil filled are the warmest Electric heaters in my opinion. I am satisfied with purchase. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: The heater had a dent in it. If it ...
customer_reviews.text: The heater had a dent in it. If it had been so cold; I would have returned it. Upset with that, but seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rose-Williams

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for my bedroom .It is safe to be on all day long and you can regulate temperature as well.
customer_reviews.author: monica petrova

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed. Warms up a little bit that’s about ...
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Warms up a little bit that’s about it. Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using for emergency backup heat w/generator
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a couple of these units to use for emergency heat if the power goes out. So far, during testing, two of these units and two ceramic towers will heat my entire house! I'm surprised. But the products work flawlessly! When the power goes out... these will be perfect to maintain a warm house.
customer_reviews.author: Spaghetti Spaghetti

customer_reviews.title: How many more times is the brand going to change?
customer_reviews.text: It is a good unit & I've owned one before & the name brand I owned was the one advertised when I puchased mine & yet I got a different brand & now I see the brand name has changed again. I did some extensive testing & I would post to share but I can't speak for a brand that wasn't the same brand that was advertised & the brand I received.
customer_reviews.author: RKG

customer_reviews.title: This is a good supplement heater
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 and used them both. This is a good supplement heater. I will give 5 stars in the future if they do well this Winter.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: quality not great.
customer_reviews.text: Made in and shipped from China. So slow to arrive, quality not great.
customer_reviews.author: Jes Lauren Luckett

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: The lamp does not light or operate even when the power button is turned on
customer_reviews.author: Seokjun park

customer_reviews.title: Should be fine
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet but base on previous experiences, I should be happy.
customer_reviews.author: L O.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, why pay more?
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about quality because the price was so low. This is a very basic oil filled radiator that heats as well (or better because it's new) as the more expensive oil filled radiator I had before. I can't advise on the longevity of operation but so far so good. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cee Gee

customer_reviews.title: Silent heater.
customer_reviews.text: Good heater for a small room/office. For medium/ large room you would need two. Very silent-no clicking. Simple operation especially for an old person. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Very slow to heat the room, but it isn't designed to be fast
customer_reviews.text: This is a radiator-style heater, meaning it sits there and radiates heat. It does not have a fan, and does not blow air around. This means it will take a LONG time to heat up a room. Probably 6 hours to feel any real difference. This is designed to sit in a room and run all day, not to quickly heat up a cold room. Once it does heat up, it does a good job of keeping things warm. I love that it has a manual on/off switch. This means you can have it plugged in to a timer plug, and also means if power goes out when the power comes back on it will automatically come back on.
customer_reviews.author: Donald H. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Warmth
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a secondary heat source in my bedroom as I don’t like to keep my heat on too high in my entire house. Easy to use, gives off a nice warm heat and my electric bill was only increased a few dollars and I use it almost every night while I’m sleeping. No issues at all!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: These oil filled portable radiator units work great. This one is a little smaller than the ...
customer_reviews.text: These oil filled portable radiator units work great. This one is a little smaller than the 2 I already had (1 Delongi unit is 28 years old and the other unit is 25 years old). A third unit I owned started to rust and eventually leaked. To keep this from happening I would not store them in a damp area. This Tangkula unit is not balanced. It is much heavier on side with the electronics and controls so be careful when moving the unit. It is lighter than the full sized units and still puts off a lot of heat.
customer_reviews.author: JWHow

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: The design of the heater is not as stable on the floor as compared to similar Peloni oil heaters. It tips forward a little easier because the casters on the front are p ok positioned a little closer to the middle. Also the power setting labels (off, I, II, III) do not align with knob position at all. Turninf knob to setting I aligns the dial with "off". Also the power light is always on if heater is plugged in, even if turned to the off position. Low quality workmanship from this company.
customer_reviews.author: B Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Leaked and Smoked 2nd Time Using
customer_reviews.text: Second time turning it on, it started leaking and smoking. Immediately turned it off and put it outside. Have a similar one from a different manufacturer that has worked reliably for years. Not sure what the deal is with this one but will be returning it as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This makes a fair amount of noise with pings and clicking. The thermostat doesn't work well, so its more like its on or off, and if on will stay on till someone complains its 80 degrees in the room
customer_reviews.author: J Swanson

customer_reviews.title: A good little heater for my home office
customer_reviews.text: This solved my problem -- heating just my study -- given my heat pump was not directed to reach my office. This is a great solution. Small, safe, quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Crescent Reader

customer_reviews.title: Nice heat - when it works
customer_reviews.text: It worked well when first put into use. However, several months later it stopped working. Absolutely NO warranty information anywhere to be found. Which indicates this is a piece of crap. I wish I'd noticed this earlier and I'd have purchased a slightly more expensive unit with a verifiable warranty. Avoid this unit
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Use this for a bedroom and it provides heat all day and night. I only need it on low and middle setting to provide enough heat. My first time owning one of these and it’s much better than an infored heater.
customer_reviews.author: Burt Heuse

customer_reviews.title: Good heat output, small footprint
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a 4yr old version that seemed like it wasn't putting out heat like it used to... but maybe its me? Does an adequate job heating my bungalow upstairs, not much different than the old one though. Still, it was inexpensive, easy to use, and unlike the smaller version you don't have to run it on MAX the whole time, to warm your room up. Other issue I had - its SO small, I have knocked it over a few times by accident. Its just a very small wheelbase so its not overly stable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Nice little heater
customer_reviews.text: Great little heater, takes the chill out of the air very nicely. I wish it had some sort of timer that shut it off as I continually forget that it is on and go to work leaving it running. Fortunately it does not consume too much power.
customer_reviews.author: D. J--se_

customer_reviews.title: purefect to keep a room at a warm tempiture
customer_reviews.text: we use it in our bedroom to keep the room warm. set at low. it helps with upstairs bedroom in an old house stay warm. if you want to wear shorts and tank top get 4, or just dress appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good heater
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. I have used heaters like this before. This one is as good as all others; I have never owned a bad one. It heats up quickly and works flawlessly. No problems at all. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: missing mish

customer_reviews.title: I had the bad one of the bunch...
customer_reviews.text: Mine broke after 3 months. This was a great heater for those 3 months and the sellers were very helpful with the situation, that's why they deserved this rating. This is an updated review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: Boy does this thing throw off some heat! I am using this in a 10x12 room with 12ft ceiling. I do have the ceiling fan running on low and the blades reversed to help the air move. It only takes about 10 mins to heat the room about 20 degrees. This does get hot to the touch but you can place your hand on it without getting burned.
customer_reviews.author: akasleepy

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be good quality and the price is fair
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get HOT at MAXIMUM settings. Been on for 2 hours. Sitting right next to unit and my chair is ice cold. Appears to be good quality and the price is fair. Doesn't perform to a reasonable level. 10X10 room and it will never heat it. Have an Oil Filled Radiator Heater in the next room and it will be warm within 20 minutes. I was hoping for more.
customer_reviews.author: Harry A. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: ( other brands) and this one is the worst. Can barely feel the heat coming off the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of this type of heater, ( other brands) and this one is the worst. Can barely feel the heat coming off the coils. Would like to return it but I have to see if they will take it back at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Bethel Sage

customer_reviews.title: Great room heater
customer_reviews.text: I am going to purchase this again, if my energy bill supports it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've had better
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't put off as much heat as I expected. I have another one of these that works way better
customer_reviews.author: Indrani

customer_reviews.title: You will only feel this thing if you are right ...
customer_reviews.text: You will only feel this thing if you are right next to it. These things are almost all the same so just go with the cheapest option.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Hing

customer_reviews.title: Tang kuala Electric oil heater
customer_reviews.text: Heats up rooms quickly. Efficient in that it can be rolled from room to room if need be.

customer_reviews.title: Great Heater!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use it in a 11 x 14 room and it keeps it very warm on the low setting. Super quiet too.

customer_reviews.title: It works fine for a very small room but will not heat ...
customer_reviews.text: It works fine for a very small room but will not heat my larger family room, even after leaving it on for an entire day.

customer_reviews.title: Best electric oil radiator I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: The controls on this are really great for such an affordable heater. It heats up quickly and radiates nicely.

customer_reviews.title: Does ok it’s smaller than I expected and puts out ...
customer_reviews.text: Does ok it’s smaller than I expected and puts out decent heat but for sure need one per room.

customer_reviews.title: so good. Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Easy to set up and use.

customer_reviews.title: Ideal back up for when my heating system breaks down ...
customer_reviews.text: Ideal back up for when my heating system breaks down. Which it generally opts to do come the first frost.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Tailer

customer_reviews.title: Good product and service
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of the and I am very happy with them. I don't have to think about them they just work.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Low cost, gets hot to touch need to keep out of Children's reach.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't seem to get as hot as my old one which I'm still using.

customer_reviews.title: Only for tiny rooms
customer_reviews.text: It did not heat enough of the room. It might be okay for a small office.

customer_reviews.title: Great heater
customer_reviews.text: It is very quiet and efficient. Heat comes on fast. I am very happy with the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: It is a really nice heater. I bought it in case the power ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a really nice heater. I bought it in case the power is out. I would plug it in my generator.
customer_reviews.author: Michael st.ledger

product_meta.title: Tangkula Electric Oil Heater, 1500W Home Office Bathroom Portable Adjustable Thermostat Radiant Heater with Wheels, Tip-Over and Overheating Protection, Space Heater
feature_bullets: 【Efficient Heating & Adjustable thermostat 】With 7 oil-filled thermal slots, which is 5.7” width and filled with 4.2 lbs oil, Tangkula radiator heater provides energy-efficient heating for medium to large rooms that need constant heat in the winter. The heater equips with 3 heat setting(600w, 900w,1500w) and adjustable thermostat, you can customize the temperature according your heating needs.

【Quiet Operation & Sealed Oil】Silent operation makes it perfect for any room, since it won’t bother you from work, sleep, chat or anything. Especially in night when you are in sleep, quiet operation will give you beautiful dream. The heater is permanently sealed with oil and it’s never need to be refilled.

【Easy to Portable & Storage】The heater equips with four heavy-duty caster wheels, which provides easy movement from this room to another room. And when cold season passed, you can take the base off and wrap the cord in the front of the heater, which ensures tidy and make the storage more easier.

【Don’t worry safety 】The heater will shut off automatically when it’s overheat. And when the heater tip over the heater will also shut off immediately. Thermal slots maintain a low surface temperature, don’t worry that you will be scalded accidently.
【Dimension of Oil Heater 】Size: 14”x5.7”x23” (LXWXH),fins width:5.7, oil volume: 4.2lbs, power supply: 120 volts AC, 60Hz, power consumption: 600W, 900W, 1500W, product weight: 20 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars313 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
